nodes.text: Hutch was a Human male who lived on Onderon and joined the Onderon rebels against the Separatists during the Clone Wars.

When the King of Onderon, Sanjay Rash, allied the planet with the Confederacy of Independent Systems, Hutch joined the Onderon rebels. He was present with Dono and Saw Gerrera when Steela Gerrera arrived with Anakin Skywalker, Rex, Obi-Wan Kenobi, and Ahsoka Tano, whose goal was to train them to defeat the droids. While Rex was training the group to disable an AAT, Saw was pushing him on to hurry.

Hutch later fought alongside Dono, Steela, and a group of Rebels on top of a balcony where they ambush a small army of Battle droids in the city of Iziz. He would eventually assist the rebels in rescuing King Ramsis Dendup from being executed.

During the battle against the Separatists, Hutch witnessed Hondo Ohnaka and his Ohnaka Gang arrive to the outpost, delivering rocket launchers to the rebels and the Onderonian military to succeed in winning the battle. He was shot down by a squad of BX-series droid commandos that led a small ambush into the outpost.
